name: Splash!
description:
This swimmer has some troubles in the pool. Can you help him get to the other side?

Oh no! Some cute little fishes have invaded the pool. Be careful and avoid them for as long as you can.

Tap left and right to swim as fast as you can in this race against the clock.

[GAME]

* The GOAL of the game is to swim as far as you can before you run out of time.

* Keep an eye on the TIME you have left, once it reaches zero the game is over.

* Collect TIME items to add another 15+ seconds to your timer.

* Avoid the FISHES in the water or the game is over.

* Try to beat your HIGHSCORE.

[CONTROLS]

Tap the LEFT or RIGHT buttons to control the swimmer's arms.

Have fun!

Reach me: https://twitter.com/fede0d

Watch other stuff: https://fede0d.github.io
